      <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Item
1</font></div>
      <div>&#160;</div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
            <div align="center">
              <table bgcolor="white" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
                  <tr bgcolor="white">
                    <td width="75%">
                      <div><img src="abn_logo.jpg" alt="">

                        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
                        <div>
                          <hr style="COLOR: #ffcc00" align="left" noshade size="4" width="30%">      </div>
                        <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 14pt; COLOR: #009999; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">Press
      Release</font></font></font></div>
                      </div>
                    </td>
                    <td nowrap width="25%">
                    </td>
                  </tr>
              </table>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div><br></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Amsterdam</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">26 August</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> 2009</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO Group reports </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">second quarter and half year
2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> financial
results</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Second
quarter 2009 update</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Group has
recorded a loss after tax of EUR 1,761 million for the second quarter 2009
bringing the half year loss after tax to EUR 2,647 million.&#160;&#160;The
Group&#8217;s second quarter 2009 profit from continuing operations has deteriorated
compared to the first quarter 2009 due to increased loan impairments in the
Dutch State acquired businesses and increased losses in the RBS acquired
businesses resulting from tightening of credit spreads and increased loan loss
provisions.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">In the second
quarter a loss after tax of EUR 1,857 million from continuing operations was
offset by a gain after tax on discontinued operations of EUR 96 million. The
Group&#8217;s total loss after taxes comprises a loss after tax of EUR 1,835 million
attributable to the Royal Bank of Scotland Group plc (RBS) acquired businesses,
a loss of EUR 10 million attributable to the Dutch State acquired businesses, a
loss of EUR 12 million attributable to the Group&#8217;s Central Items.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Group&#8217;s half
year results are modestly positive for the Dutch State acquired businesses with
EUR 77 million and include furthermore a loss after tax of EUR 2,763 million
attributable to the RBS acquired businesses and a loss after tax of EUR 60
million for Central Items.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">A gain of EUR 96
million attributable to Banco Santander S.A. (Santander&#8217;s) remaining acquired
businesses in ABN AMRO Group is reported as profit from discontinued operations
in the second quarter and EUR 99 million for the half year.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">An overview of the results and
financial position of the Dutch State acquired businesses is included in
Appendix I and a summary of the Group results and financial position in Appendix
II of this release.&#160;&#160;The results of the RBS acquired businesses are
not meaningful on a standalone basis due to transfer of certain assets to,
coupled with new business now being written in RBS.&#160;&#160;For further
information regarding the results of the RBS acquired businesses, please refer
to the RBS 30 June 2009 Interim Results published on 7 August 2009 and available
on the RBS website (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">www.RBS.com</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">).</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For further
information regarding the ABN AMRO Holding N.V. 30 June 2009 Interim Results, we
refer to our Interim Financial Report available on the ABN AMRO website (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">www.ABNAMRO.com</font>).</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Capital,
liquidity and funding</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Group
continues to be well funded and capitalised.&#160;&#160;At 30 June 2009, the
Group&#8217;s tier 1 ratio was 13.3% (31 December 2008: 10.9%) and the total capital
ratio was 17.9% (31 December 2008: 14.4%).&#160;&#160;This reflects a reduction
in risk weighted assets in the first half year 2009 and a EUR 3 billion capital
injection by its parent company RFS Holdings B.V.&#160;&#160;Our capital ratios
continue to exceed the minimum tier 1 and total capital ratios of 9% and 12.5%
respectively set by the Dutch Central Bank during the separation period of ABN
AMRO Group.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group continues to comfortably exceed the
regulatory liquidity requirements.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">On 31 July ABN AMRO has issued a EUR 800
million Mandatory Convertible Tier-1 Security (MCS) that was acquired by the
Ministry of Finance.&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Also on that date a </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Credit Default Swap</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> (CDS) agreement was signed with a start
date of no later than </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">31
August 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">.&#160;&#160;Through this arrangement
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. will purchase credit protection on a EUR 34.5 billion
portfolio of own originated residential mortgages.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
        </div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>&#160;</div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">On 6 July 2009 ABN
AMRO Group successfully issued a five-year EUR 2 billion Covered
Bond.&#160;&#160;The issuance enjoyed a healthy demand from investors thus
demonstrating the funding capabilities of the Bank.&#160;&#160;This program is
now also registered with the Dutch Central Bank. By the registration as a
programme governed by the Dutch Covered Bond law, the programme complies with
all requirements.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Update
on separation</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Update
on Separation activity</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">RBS and the Dutch
State continue to work towards the legal separation of the Dutch State acquired
businesses from the residual RBS acquired businesses into two separate banks and
additionally with Santander on the settlement of the Consortium shareholder
agreement.&#160;&#160;Important and critical milestones relating to the legal
demerger and subsequent separation have recently been reached as we move towards
legal separation.&#160;&#160;This includes the completion of a major part of the
technical separation of ABN AMRO&#8217;s banking and payments operating systems and
processes.&#160;&#160;Legal demerger, previously referred to as the legal
segregation, will occur upon transfer of the Dutch State acquired businesses out
of ABN AMRO Bank N.V., the demerging entity, into a separate legal entity ABN
AMRO II N.V., a fully owned subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., that was
incorporated and registered with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce earlier in
2009.&#160;&#160;Legal separation out of the ABN AMRO Group will occur when ABN
AMRO II N.V. is separated from ABN AMRO Group and functions as a new independent
bank. This is aimed to be achieved by the end of this year.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Constituting a
pivotal step in the demerger process, ABN AMRO Bank N.V. plans to file legal
demerger documentation with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce in September
2009.&#160;&#160;For further information we also refer to Appendix
III.&#160;&#160;As part of the restructuring process, the Dutch State acquired
businesses and activities are being transferred into the newly formed entity ABN
AMRO II N.V., subject to Dutch Central Bank approval.&#160;&#160;Subsequent to
the transfer of selected entities into ABN AMRO II N.V. and completion of a
demerger according to Dutch law of assets and liabilities to this entity, ABN
AMRO II N.V. will be renamed "ABN AMRO Bank N.V.".&#160;&#160;This bank will
operate under a separate banking licence, a request for which has been submitted
to the the Dutch Central Bank.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO expects to have obtained the
banking licence before the execution of the legal
demerger.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The smooth
separation of these businesses from ABN AMRO Group remains a priority for the
Managing Board, targeted for completion by the end of 2009 in line with our
announced plans.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group and its shareholders intend to ensure
that by legal separation both separate banks are adequately capitalized and have
sound liquidity positions.&#160;&#160;The Bank continues to pursue the sale of
part of the Dutch commercial clients&#8217; activities and selected regional branch
offices to comply with the requirements of the European
Commission.&#160;&#160;The sale will be subject to approval by the shareholder,
the European Commission and the Dutch Central Bank.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">A request for an
extension of the sale period by the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"> to the European
Commission, has been granted until the beginning of
September.</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Following the
separation of the Dutch State acquired businesses, the existing ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. will be renamed "The Royal Bank of Scotland N.V." (RBS N.V.). The future
RBS N.V. will be an integral part of the RBS Group and will principally contain
the international lending, international transaction services and equities
businesses of the RBS Group.&#160;&#160;These remaining activities will continue
to be subject to Dutch Central Bank supervision and on a consolidated basis as
part of the RBS Group subject to UK Financial Services Authority
supervision.&#160;&#160;Due to the change in the operating model of RBS N.V.
compared to pre-acquisition ABN AMRO Bank N.V. a licence renewal application
procedure is required.&#160;&#160;This licence renewal application has been
lodged with the Dutch Central Bank.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO expects to have obtained
the renewed banking licence before the execution of the legal
demerger.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Central Items
business segment includes items (referred to as Shared Assets) that are not
allocated to, but economically shared by the Consortium Members, and accumulated
amounts payable to Santander arising from the disposal of Latin America and
other sales and settlements.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;</font>The economic interest
in the Shared Assets will remain shared until all Consortium Members have agreed
on disposal, allocation or made other arrangements.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Governance
until legal separation</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Until final legal
separation, expected to occur before the end of the year, ABN AMRO Group will
continue to be governed by its Managing Board and Supervisory Board and
regulated on a consolidated basis with capital ratios, liquidity measures and
exposures being reported to and regulated by the Dutch Central
Bank.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Managing Board
and the Supervisory Board of ABN AMRO Group have approved the intention to
repatriate via RFS Holdings B.V. capital for the benefit of Santander in the
amount of EUR 6.5 billion, subject to regulatory approval.&#160;&#160;Any future
capital repatriations to individual Consortium Members are part of an overall
capital plan authorised within the governance of ABN AMRO Group and agreed
between Consortium Members.&#160;&#160;Additionally, these are subject to
regulatory approval.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

            <td valign="top" width="82%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">ABN AMRO
      Group&#8217;s financial results included in this press release do not include
      all the information and disclosures required in the annual financial
      statements. This press release should be read in conjunction with the
      Group&#8217;s Interim Financial Report for the six months ended 30 June 2009 and
      also the audited financial statements as part of the Annual Report as at
      31 December 2008 which was prepared in accordance with &#8216;International
      Financial Reporting Standards (&#8216;IFRS&#8217;) as issued by the International
      Accounting Standards Board and IFRS as adopted by the European Union.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #999999">&#160;</font>In preparing
      financial information in this press release, the same accounting policies
      and methods of computation are followed as were applied in the preparation
      of the Group&#8217;s financial statements for the year ended 31 December 2008,
      except, where applicable, for the impact for the adoption of the Standards
      and interpretations as described in the Group&#8217;s Interim Financial Report
      for the six months ended 30 June 2009. All amounts in this press release
      are unaudited. Small differences are possible in the tables due to
      rounding.</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Certain </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">statements in this press

      expectations and other forward-looking statements</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Such statements are based on
      current expectations, and by their nature are subject to a number of risks
      and uncertainties that could cause actual results and performance to
      differ materially from any expected future results or performance,
      expressed or implied, by these statements.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> Factors that could </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">cause actual results to differ
      materially from those estimated by the forward looking statements
      contained in this document </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">include, but are not limited to i)
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the extent and nature
      of future developments and continued volatility in the credit markets and
      their impact on the financial industry in gen</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">eral and ABN AMRO in particular,
      ii) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the effect on ABN
      AMRO&#8217;s capital of write downs</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> in respect of credit exposures,
      iii) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">risks related to
      ABN AMRO&#8217;s transition and separation process following its acquisition by
      the consortium consisting of The Royal Bank of Scotland Group plc (&#8216;RBS&#8217;),
      the State of the Netherlands (&#8216;Dutch State&#8217;) and Banco Santander S.A.
      (&#8216;Santander&#8217;)</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, iv)
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">general economic
      conditions in the Netherlands and in other countries in which ABN AMRO has
      significant business activities or investments, e.g. the United Kingdom
      and the United States, including the impact of recessionary economic
      conditions on ABN AMRO's revenue</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s, liquidity and balance sheet, v)
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the actions taken by
      governments and their agencies to support individu</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">al banks and the banking system,
      vi) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the monetary and
      interest rate policies of the European Central Bank, the Board of
      Governors of the Federal Reserve Sys</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">tem and other G-7 central banks,
      vii) inflation or deflation, viii) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">unanticipated turbulence in
      interest rates, foreign currency exchange rates, capital markets,
      comm</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">odity prices and
      equity prices, ix) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">changes in Dutch and
      forei</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">gn laws,
      regulations and taxes, x) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">changes in compet</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ition and pricing environments,
      xi) natural and other disasters, xii) </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the inability to he</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">dge certain risks economically,
      xiii) the adequacy of loss reserves, xiv) technological changes, xv)
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">changes in
      consu</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">mer spending and
      saving habits and xvi)</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> the success of ABN AMRO in
      managing the risks relating to the foregoing.</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The forward-looking statements
      made in this </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">press

      at the d</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ate of

      assume any responsibility to do so.</font></font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">APPENDIX
I &#8211; Financial results and position of the Dutch State acquired
businesses</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Results

    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">1&#160;&#160;&#160;
These figures are excluding the Private equity consolidation effect and are
therefore a non-GAAP measure. See Appendix II for the Private Equity
consolidation effect for the Group. </font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The businesses
acquired by the Dutch State, consisting of the Dutch commercial and retail
banking and international private client and diamonds businesses were impacted
by lower operating income and higher loan impairments in the second quarter 2009
than in the first quarter of the year and the comparable quarter in
2008.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Operating income
has decreased compared to the first quarter.&#160;&#160;The competition in the
Netherlands for client deposits contributed to the decline in net interest
income of 13%, which was also impacted by slightly lower treasury
results.&#160;&#160;The downward trend of rates in the Dutch savings markets,
could be marked as a first sign of recovery.&#160;&#160;Operating income has
also benefited from the inclusion of our share in the profit generated by Delta
Lloyd and Equens, which incorporates the audited net profit of these businesses
for 2008.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Operating expenses
continue to benefit from cost control measures.&#160;&#160;The increase in
operating expenses reflects higher restructuring costs and the impact of a
refinement of the cost allocation in the Netherlands between the Dutch State
acquired and the RBS acquired businesses.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Loan impairments
predominantly comprise specific provisions against commercial loan portfolios
and include increased levels of incurred but not yet identified provisions on
the basis of continued assessment of the economic climate and the expected loan
impairments for the year.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>

            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;1&#160;&#160;
The presentation of total amounts includes EUR 13.1 billion (31 March 2009: EUR
9.7 billion) of net intercompany receivables, which are netted with other
segments within liabilities for consolidation purposes.&#160;</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;2&#160;&#160;
Allocated equity excludes the Dutch State&#8217;s share in the equity deficit in
Central Items.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Total assets
increased predominantly as a result of purchases of high quality debt securities
for asset and liability management purposes and higher settlement balances as at
30 June 2009.&#160;&#160;An increase in total liabilities is mainly attributable
to increases in savings and current account balances for both the consumer and
commercial customers.&#160;&#160;This has also supported the increase of the
Assets under Management in Private Clients since the end of the first quarter
2009, which have furthermore benefited from the improvement in market conditions
and a net inflow.&#160;&#160;Overall levels of Assets under Management continue
to be impacted by the weakness in the financial markets.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

        </div>

II - Financial results and position of the Group</font></div>

summary of the ABN AMRO Group results and financial position.</font></div>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">1&#160; </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Consolidation effect
is the impact per line item of the private equity investments which are required
to be consolidated under International Financial Reporting Standards
(IFRS).&#160;&#160;Private equity is not considered part of the banking
activities.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The Group's second quarter 2009
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">results</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> from continuing operations
ha</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ve</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> deteriorated compared to the first
quarter 2009.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font>The second quarter of 2009
is impacted by losses resulting from tightening of credit
spreads.&#160;&#160;Fair valued own liabilities have shown losses as well as
Credit Default Swaps entered into for hedging of credit
positions.&#160;&#160;While the first quarter of 2009 included high losses from
credit crisis affected positions, including credit valuation adjustments on
monolines, Credit Derivative Product Companies and fair value charges of
Collateralized Debt Obligation positions, these results are no longer present in
the second quarter 2009 after the completion of the legal and risk transfer of
most of these positions to RBS.&#160;&#160;The operating expenses in the second
quarter were affected by the impairment of goodwill on RBS acquired Asian
entities, which are part of the disposal group that is being
sold.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Loan impairments
have increased reflecting the challenging credit
environment.</font></font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">

        </div>
      </div>

            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt">BIS ratio
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-STYLE: italic">(percentages)</font></font></div>
            </td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Core tier
      1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">11.94</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">11.71</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Tier
      1</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">13.31</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">12.74</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="78%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Total BIS
      ratio</font></div>
            </td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">17.93</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">16.78</font></td>
            <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
          </tr>
      </table>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The decrease of the
Group&#8217;s total assets of EUR 77 billion, or 13%, during the second quarter,
principally reflects market to market fluctuations in the trading book and the
transfers of certain assets and activities from the ABN AMRO Group to RBS,
reducing the risk profile of the Group and supporting the implementation of the
strategy for the future RBS N.V.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
    <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div id="FTR">
        <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">7</font></div>
        <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
          <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
        </div>
      </div>
      <div id="HDR">
        <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br>&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">APPENDIX
III &#8211; Legal demerger</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Holding
N.V. (&#8216;ABN AMRO&#8217;) was acquired by a consortium of banks through RFS Holdings
B.V. on 17 October 2007. The consortium consisted of The Royal Bank of Scotland
Group (38%), Fortis Bank (34%) and Banco Santander SA (28%). On 24 December 2008
the Fortis Bank Nederland (Holding) N.V. share in RFS Holding B.V. was
transferred to the Dutch State, following the acquisition by the Dutch State in
October 2008 of Fortis Bank Nederland (Holding) N.V., including its share in RFS
Holdings B.V.&#160;&#160;The shareholders have split the assets and liabilities
included in ABN AMRO Group on the basis of the arrangements included in the
Consortium and Shareholders&#8217; Agreement of 28 May 2007 and further agreements
made.&#160;&#160;These agreements include the economic allocation of capital and
debt instruments between Dutch State and RBS acquired businesses.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Group has
chosen a two-step approach for the legal separation of the assets and
liabilities allocated to the indirect ownership of the Dutch State, referred to
as the Dutch State acquired businesses:</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Step 1</font> - &#8220;Legal Demerger&#8221;:
Transferring the majority of the Dutch State acquired businesses from ABN AMRO
Bank N.V. to a new legal entity, ABN AMRO II N.V.&#160;&#160;Some subsidiaries
and assets and liabilities are separately transferred to the new legal entity,
mostly on or around the planned legal demerger date.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt;" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;&#160;&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Step 2</font> - &#8220;Legal Separation&#8221;:
Transferring the shares of ABN AMRO II N.V. from ABN AMRO Holding N.V. to a new
Holding Company fully owned by the Dutch State and independent of ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. This is planned for execution by the end of 2009.&#160;&#160;ABN
AMRO Holding N.V will then be renamed The Royal Bank of Scotland Holding
N.V.</font></div>
    </div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Bank N.V.
plans to file legal demerger documentation with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce in
September.&#160;&#160;&#160;The demerger proposal outlines the Bank&#8217;s legal
demerger process and provides creditors of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. with pro forma
financial information as of 30 June 2009 allowing for assessment of the impact
of the legal transfers and demergers on ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#160;&#160;The
documentation includes information on the impact on employees, creditors and
suppliers and will be available on the ABN AMRO&#8217;s website (<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">www.abnamro.com</font>).
The legal demerger proposal comprises a description of the assets and
liabilities to be transferred and pro forma financial information.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Dutch State&#8217;s
part of the assets and liabilities that are not yet allocated to any of the
Consortium shareholders, the so-called Shared Assets, are not included in the
legal demerger.&#160;&#160;These are in the process of being sold or otherwise
transferred.&#160;&#160;They will at the time of legal separation continue to be
legally held by RBS N.V. under shared economic ownership until such time that
they will be divested or otherwise discontinued.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Following the
demerger and the transfer of the Dutch State acquired businesses into the new
bank, the existing ABN AMRO Bank N.V. will be renamed The Royal Bank of Scotland
N.V. (RBS N.V.).&#160;&#160;The new legal entity comprising the Dutch State
acquired businesses will be named ABN AMRO Bank N.V.&#160;&#160;Both entities
are 100% owned by ABN AMRO Holding N.V. during this phase and will be governed
by the ABN AMRO Holding N.V. Managing Board and Supervisory Board, while being
regulated on a consolidated basis by the Dutch Central Bank.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">ABN AMRO Group
continues to operate as a separately well capitalised and regulated entity under
the supervision of the Dutch Central Bank during the period of transition,
continuing to exceed the minimum Tier 1 and a Total Capital ratios set by the
Dutch Central Bank throughout the transition period, of 9% and 12.5%
respectively.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group continues to meet the regulatory
liquidity requirements and to be well funded.&#160;&#160;The future independent
banks, RBS N.V. and ABN AMRO Bank N.V. (new) expect to continue to comply with
Dutch Central Bank minimum liquidity and solvency requirements.&#160;&#160;The
Dutch Central Bank has been extensively informed about and involved in the
transaction structure for the Dutch State acquired businesses with approvals
seeked where required.</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Further
information on the legal demerger will be made available on the following
Intranet links</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For the ABN AMRO
Bank N.V. Issued Debt Instruments Economic Allocation please refer to:
</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">http://<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">www.group.abnamro.com/financials/allocation.cfm</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Investor Relations
ABN AMRO: <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">http://www.group.abnamro.com/investors/investors.cfm</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Update on
Separation: <font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #0000ff; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">http://www.future.abnamro.com/en/home.cfm</font></font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-STYLE: italic; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For
further information, please contact</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><br></div>
    <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
          <tr>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="42%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">ABN
      AMRO Group Press Office</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">pressrelations@nl.abnamro.com</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">+31 20
      6288900</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
            </td>
            <td align="left" valign="top" width="40%">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">RBS
      Group Investor Relations</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Richard
      O&#8217;Connor, +44 207 672 1758</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Anne-Marie.Hartnett@rbs.com</font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 9pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Neil Moorhouse, +44 131 523
      4414</font></font></div>
            </td>

    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Item 2</font></div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">&#160;</div>
    <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left">
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>

        <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font></div><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 16pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, sans-serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Interim Financial Report for the six

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
        <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">UNAUDITED</font></font><br></font></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Cautionary statement on forward-looking
statements</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Certain sections in this document
contain &#8216;forward-looking statements&#8217; as that term is defined in the United
States Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, such as statements that
include the words &#8216;expect&#8217;, &#8216;estimate&#8217;, &#8216;project&#8217;, &#8216;anticipate&#8217;, &#8216;should&#8217;,
&#8216;intend&#8217;, &#8216;plan&#8217;, &#8216;probability&#8217;, &#8216;risk&#8217;, &#8216;Value-at-Risk (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">VaR</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">)&#8217;, &#8216;target&#8217;, &#8216;goal&#8217;, &#8216;objective&#8217;,
&#8216;will&#8217;, &#8216;endeavour&#8217;, &#8216;outlook&#8217;, 'optimistic', 'prospects' and similar
expressions or variations on such expressions.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In particular, this document includes
forward-looking statements relating, but not limited, to ABN AMRO Holding N.V.&#8217;s
(referred to as &#8216;the Group&#8217;, &#8216;ABN AMRO&#8217; or &#8216;ABN AMRO Group&#8217;) potential exposures
to various types of market risks, such as counterparty risk, interest rate risk,
foreign exchange rate risk</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> commodity and equity price risk and
credit risks. Such statements are subject to risks and uncertainties. For
example, certain of the market risk disclosures are dependent on choices about
key model characteristics and assumptions and are subject to various
limitations. By their nature, certain of the market risk disclosures are only
estimates and, as a result, actual future gains and losses could differ
materially</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Other factors that could cause actual
results to differ materially from those estimated by the forward looking
statements contained in this document include, but are not limited
to:</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000;" face="Symbol, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#183;</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the extent and nature of future
      developments </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">and
      continued volatility </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">in the credit markets and their
      impact on the financial industry in general and ABN AMRO in
      particular;</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">

              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the effect on ABN AMRO&#8217;s capital
      of write downs in respect of credit
  exposures;</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000;" face="Symbol, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#183;</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">risks related to ABN AMRO&#8217;s
      transition and separation process following its acquisition by the
      </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">C</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">onsortium consisting of The Royal
      Bank of Scotland Group plc (&#8216;RBS&#8217;), the State of the Netherlands (&#8216;Dutch
      State&#8217;)</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">
      and</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> Banco Santander
      S.A. (&#8216;Santander&#8217;);</font></font></div>

              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000;" face="Symbol, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#183;</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">general economic conditions in the
      Netherlands and in other countries in which ABN AMRO has significant
      business activities or investments, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">e.g.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> the United Kingdom and the United
      States</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> including the impact of
      recessionary economic conditions on ABN AMRO's revenues, liquidity and
      balance sheet;</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000;" face="Symbol, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#183;</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the actions taken by governments
      and their agencies to support individual banks and the banking
      system;</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%">
            <tr valign="top" style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25;">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 18pt">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000;" face="Symbol, serif"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#183;</font>&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the monetary and interest rate
      policies of the European Central Bank, the Board of Governors of the
      Federal Reserve System and other G-7 central
  banks;</font></font></div>
              </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>

      deflation;</font></font></div>

prices;</font></font></div>
