      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Factors that could
also adversely affect ABN AMRO&#8217;s results or the accuracy of forward-looking
statements in this report, and the factors discussed here or in the section
&#8216;Risk factors&#8217;, included in the ABN AMRO&#8217;s 2008 Annual Report, should not be
regarded as a complete set of all potential risks or uncertainties. ABN AMRO has
economic, financial market, credit, legal and other specialists who monitor
economic and market conditions and government policies and actions. However,
because it is difficult to predict with complete accuracy any changes in
economic or market conditions or in governmental policies and actions, it is
hard for ABN AMRO to anticipate the effects that such changes could have on ABN
AMRO&#8217;s financial performance and business operations.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The forward-looking
statements made in this report speak only as at the date of publication of this
report. ABN AMRO does not intend to publicly update or revise these
forward-looking statements to reflect events or circumstances after the date of
this report, nor does ABN AMRO assume any responsibility to do so.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page 3 of
37</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO Group reports first half 2009
financial results</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Chairman&#8217;s Review</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">First half 2009
update</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO recorded a loss after tax of
EUR 2,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">6</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">4</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">7</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million for the first half 2009. This
comprises a loss after tax of EUR 2,763 million attributable to RBS acquired
businesses, a gain of EUR 77 million attributable to the Dutch State acquired
businesses, a loss of EUR 60 million attributable to the Group&#8217;s Central
Items</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and a</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> gain of EUR 99 million attributable to
Santander&#8217;s remaining acquired businesses </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">which are</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> reported discontinued
operations.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The loss after tax from continuing
operations of EUR 2,746 million compares to a loss of EUR 2,860 million for the
first half of 2008.&#160;&#160;The movement reflects lower fair value losses on
positions in the trading book and a general reduction in operating expenses due
to the scaling down of certain activities within the Group offset by increases
in loan impairment provisions.&#160;&#160;For further analysis of the ABN AMRO
Group results by business segment please refer to the Operating and Financial
Review section of this report.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Update on Separation
activity</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">RBS and the Dutch
State continue to work towards the legal separation of the Dutch State acquired
businesses from the residual RBS acquired businesses into two separate banks and
additionally with Santander on the settlement of the Consortium shareholder
agreement.&#160;&#160;Important and critical milestones relating to the legal
demerger and subsequent separation have recently been reached as we move towards
legal separation.&#160;&#160;This includes the completion of a major part of the
technical separation of ABN AMRO&#8217;s banking and payments operating systems and
processes.&#160;&#160;Legal demerger, previously referred to as the legal
segregation, will occur upon transfer of Dutch State acquired businesses out of
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. into a separate legal entity, ABN AMRO II N.V., a fully owned
subsidiary of ABN AMRO Holding N.V., that was incorporated and registered with
the Dutch Chamber of Commerce earlier in 2009.&#160;&#160;Legal separation out
of the ABN AMRO Group will occur when ABN AMRO II N.V. is separated from the ABN
AMRO Group and functions as a new independent bank. This is aimed to be achieved
by the end of this year.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Constituting a
pivotal step in the demerger process, ABN AMRO plans to file legal demerger
documentation with the Dutch Chamber of Commerce in September 2009. This
document outlines the Group&#8217;s legal demerger process and provides creditors of
ABN AMRO Bank N.V. with pro forma financial information as of 30 June 2009
allowing for assessment of the impact of the legal transfers and demerger on ABN
AMRO Bank N.V. The document includes information on the impact on employees,
creditors and suppliers. As part of the restructuring process, the Dutch State
acquired businesses and activities are being transferred into the newly formed
entity ABN AMRO II N.V., subject to Dutch Central Bank approval. Subsequent to
the transfer of selected entities into ABN AMRO II N.V. and completion of a
demerger according to Dutch law of assets and liabilities to this entity, ABN
AMRO II N.V. will be renamed "ABN AMRO Bank N.V.".&#160;&#160;This bank will
operate under a separate banking licence, a request for which has been submitted
to the Dutch Central Bank. ABN AMRO expects to have obtained the banking licence
before the execution of the legal demerger.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The smooth
separation of these businesses from ABN AMRO Group remains a priority for the
Managing Board, targeted for completion by the end of 2009 in line with our
announced plans.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO Group and its shareholders intend to ensure
that by legal separation both separate banks are adequately capitalized and have
sound liquidity positions.&#160;&#160;The Group continues to pursue the sale of
part of the Dutch commercial clients&#8217; activities and selected regional branch
offices to comply with the requirements of the European
Commission.&#160;&#160;The sale will be subject to approval by the shareholder,
the European Commission and the Dutch Central Bank.&#160;&#160;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">A request for an extension of the sale
period by the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> to the European Commission has been
granted until the beginning of September.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Following the
separation of the Dutch State acquired businesses, the existing ABN AMRO Bank
N.V. will be renamed "The Royal Bank of Scotland N.V." (&#8216;RBS N.V.&#8217;). The future
RBS N.V. will be an integral part of the RBS Group and will principally contain
the international lending, international transaction services and equities
businesses of the RBS Group.&#160;&#160;These activities will continue to be
subject to Dutch Central Bank supervision and on a consolidated basis as part of
the RBS Group subject to UK Financial Services Authority supervision. Due to the
change in the operating model of RBS N.V. compared to pre-acquisition ABN AMRO
Bank N.V. a licence renewal application procedure is required.&#160;&#160;This
licence renewal application has been lodged with the Dutch Central Bank. ABN
AMRO expects to have obtained the renewed banking licence before the execution
of the legal demerger.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page 4 of
37</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div>&#160;</div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Central Items
business segment includes items (referred to as Shared Assets) that are not
allocated to but economically shared by the Consortium Members and accumulated
amounts payable to Santander arising from the disposal of Banco Real and other
sales and settlements.<font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;</font>The economic interest
in the Shared Assets will remain shared until all Consortium Members have agreed
on disposal, allocation or made other arrangements.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Governance until legal
separation</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Until final legal
separation, expected to occur before the end of the year, ABN AMRO Group will
continue to be governed by its Managing Board and Supervisory Board and
regulated on a consolidated basis with capital ratios, liquidity measures and
exposures being reported to and regulated by the Dutch Central
Bank.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">The Managing Board
and the Supervisory Board of ABN AMRO Group have approved the intention to
repatriate via RFS Holdings B.V. capital for the benefit of Santander in the
amount of EUR 6.5 billion, subject to regulatory approval. Any future capital
repatriations to individual Consortium Members are part of an overall capital
plan authorised within the governance of ABN AMRO Group and agreed between
Consortium Members.&#160;&#160;Additionally, these are subject to regulatory
approval.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">RBS Strategic Review</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The RBS interim results release on 7
August 2009 outlined further updates to its strategic restructuring plan,
initially announced in the RBS Group 2008 Annual Results, which includes
businesses acquired from ABN AMRO. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The RBS Group has been restructured into
Core and Non-core</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">
elements</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.&#160;&#160;RBS
expects to substantially run down or dispose of the businesses, assets and
portfolios within the Non-core division by 2013.&#160;&#160;Some ABN AMRO
businesses are included in this new Non-core </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">division</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, most notably certain businesses in
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Asia</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.&#160;&#160;RBS recently announced that
it had entered into a sale agreement with ANZ Group Limited to sell its Retail
and Commercial Banking operations in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Taiwan</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Hong Kong</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Singapore</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Indonesia</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and the onshore Global Banking and
Markets, and Global Transaction Services operations in the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Philippines</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Vietnam</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Taiwan</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. Completion of the transaction is
expected within an eight to 13 month period depending on the jurisdiction.
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Additionally, on 12 August
2009 RBS announced that it had agreed to sell its 99.37% holding in The Royal
Bank of Scotland Limited (RBS Pakistan) to MCB Bank Limited, subject to
regulatory approvals. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">RBS
remains in discussion with bidders for the remaining assets it has decided to
sell in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Asia</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Capital, liquidity and
funding</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO continues to be well funded and
capitalised.&#160;&#160;At 30 June 2009, the Group&#8217;s tier 1 ratio was 13.3% (31
December 2008: 10.9%) and the total capital ratio was 17.9% (31 December 2008:
14.4%).&#160;&#160;This reflects a reduction in risk weighted assets in the
first half year 2009 and a EUR 3 billion capital injection by</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> its parent company</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> R</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">FS Holdings B.V</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.&#160;&#160;Our capital ratios continue
to exceed the minimum tier 1 and total capital ratios of 9% and 12.5%
respectively set by the D</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">utch Central </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">B</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> during the separation period of ABN
AMRO Group.&#160;&#160;ABN AMRO continues to comfortably exceed the regulatory
liquidity requirements.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">On 6 July 2009 ABN AMRO successfully
issued a five-year EUR 2 billion Covered Bond</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> The issuance </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">enjoyed</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> healthy demand from investors thus
demonstrating the funding capabilities of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. This program is now also registered
with the Dutch Central Bank. By the registration as a programme governed by the
Dutch Covered Bond law, the programme complies with all
requirements.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #1b1c20; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">Update on capital actions due to legal
separation</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">On 26 June 2009, the Minister of Finance
of the Netherlands (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">the Minister</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">) as part of an update letter to the
Dutch Lower House of Parliament on the strategy, risk policy, legal structure
and the separation plan, requested approval for specific capitalisation actions.
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">In July 2009 the Dutch
Parliament approved the Minister&#8217;s request to acquire a EUR 800 million
Mandatory Convertible Tier-1 Security (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">MCS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) to be issued by ABN AMRO Bank N.V. and
enter into a Credit Default Swap (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">CDS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">) agreement with ABN AMRO Bank
N.V.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">The MCS has been issued and was acquired
by the Ministry of Finance on 31 July 2009. When ABN AMRO II N.V. transfers out
of ABN AMRO Holding N.V</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> on
legal separation</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> the
security will mandatorily convert into common equity of ABN AMRO II
N.V.&#160;&#160;The MCS pays a 10% coupon and ABN AMRO Bank N.V. may defer
coupons at any time.&#160;&#160;In case ABN AMRO Bank N.V. is in breach of
minimum capital adequacy requirements, as set by the D</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">utch Central </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">B</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">, the coupon payments will be
mandator</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">i</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">ly</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20"> d</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">eferred</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #1b1c20">.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">T</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">he CDS agreement </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">was</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> signed on 31 July 2009 with a start
date of no later than 31 August 2009.&#160;&#160;Through this arrangement ABN
AMRO Bank N.V. will purchase credit protection, for a fee of 51.5</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">bps p.a. on the outstanding portfolio
amount, currently EUR 34.5 billion portfolio of own originated residential
mortgages.&#160;&#160;Under the</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page 5 of
37</font></div>
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="HDR">
          <div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right">
          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font size="+0"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">agreement
losses will&#160;be shared pari passu between ABN AMRO Bank N.V. for 5% and
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;for
95%, with a first loss for ABN AMRO Bank N.V. of 20bps p.a.&#160;&#160;This
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">CDS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;will
reduce the risk-weighted assets of ABN AMRO Bank N.V. by EUR 19
billion.</font></font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Further capital may be required as a
result of the sale of part of the Dutch commercial client activities and
selected regional branch offices to comply with the requirements of the European
Commission.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">RBS will continue to ensure that its
businesses included in the future RBS N.V. are appropriately
capitalised.&#160;&#160;RBS would not have to raise new capital for this, as any
required capital transfers have already been factored into RBS Group&#8217;s capital
plan.&#160;&#160;Any capital transfers from RBS </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Group</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> to RBS N.V. are subject to oversight by
the UK Financial Services Authority.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Capital repatriation</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">On 7 August 2009 approval from the
D</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">utch Central </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">B</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">ank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> was sought on the distribution of EUR
6.5 billion from ABN AMRO Bank N.V. to ABN AMRO Holding N.V. to enable ABN AMRO
Holding N.V. to pay a dividend of EUR 6.5 billion to RFS Holdings B.V. for
capital repatriation to its shareholder Santander, relating to realised proceeds
from the 2008 sale of the Santander acquired businesses. Any further
distribution for the benefit of Consortium </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">embers will be subject to separate
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Dutch Central
Bank</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> approval and will be
carried out upon the completion of planned capital actions.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Gerrit Zalm</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #00201f; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Chairman of the Managing Board of ABN
AMRO</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">Amsterdam</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f">26</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #00201f"> August 2009</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>

              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font></div>

      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Financial

              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">ABN AMRO is comprised of three
reportable segments, namely &#8220;RBS acquired&#8221;, &#8220;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired&#8221; and &#8220;Central Items&#8221;. The &#8220;RBS
acquired&#8221; segment principally contains the international lending</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> international transaction services with
operations in Europe, Asia and the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Americas</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and the equities business of the RBS
Group</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. The &#8220;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired&#8221; segment serves Dutch
commercial clients, Dutch consumer clients, and Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and international</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> private clients</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, and includes t</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">he International Diamond and Jewelry
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">business</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. The &#8220;Central Items&#8221; segment includes
items that are not allocated to but economically shared by the Consortium
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">embers as well as </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">accumulated </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">amounts accruing to Banco Santander
S.A.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">arising from the disposal of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Banco Real</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and other sales and
settlements.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In prior periods the Group disclosed six
reportable segments, namely Europe, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Americas</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, Asia, the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Netherlands</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, Private Clients and Central Items. The
change from six reportable segments to three reportable segments reflects the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">focus of the Managing Board
on the creation and subsequent </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">legal separation of the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">acquired businesses from the residual
RBS acquired businesses into two separate </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">independent </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">banks, and the consequential impact that
this progression has had on the management of the Group.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Comparative segment figures have been
restated to reflect the current organisation structure.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Measurement of segment assets,
liabilities, income and results is based on the Group&#8217;s accounting policies.
Segment assets, liabilities, income and results include items directly
attributable to a segment.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000">For an analysis of the
current period performance see the commentary by business segment set forth
below:</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

      </font></td>
              <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td colspan="5" valign="bottom" width="19%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">IFRS</font></font></div>

              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td colspan="5" valign="bottom" width="19%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Consolidation effect</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; COLOR: #000000">1</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td colspan="6" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font>
      <font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Excluding consolidation effect

      2</font></font></div>

              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">11</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">3</font></font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">1&#160;&#160;This is the impact per line
item of the private equity investments which are required to be consolidated
under IFRS</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 9pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">2&#160;&#160;Private equity is not
considered part of the banking activities</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: -9pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">3&#160;&#160;The presentation of total
amounts includes EUR 13.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">1</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> billion (December 2008: EUR 6.4
billion) of net</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">
intercompany</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> receivables,
which are netted with other segments within liabilities for consolidation
purposes. </font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The businesses acquired by the
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> consist of the Dutch commercial and
retail banking, international private clients and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">t</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">he International Diamond and Jewelry
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">business</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. The results for the six months ended
30 June 200</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">9</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> are not entirely comparable to
th</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">e prior</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">period </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">due to the inclusion of certain funding
and liquidity portfolios allocated to the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired businesses </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">only as </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">from 1 April 2008
onward.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Net interest income decreased by EUR 171
million, or 11%, to EUR 1,449 million reflecting a general pressure on customer
and client interest rates and inclusion of the allocated funding and liquidity
portfolios for the full period. The decrease in net fee and commission income of
EUR 92 million, or 13%, is attributable to decreased investment activity by
clients in response to the volatile conditions of the financial markets since
the latter half of 2008. Net trading income decreased by EUR 74 million, or 81%,
to EUR 17 million largely as a result of fair value losses recorded on a
portfolio of public sector loans following increased credit spreads. Results
from financial transactions revenue benefited from gains on the sale of debt
securities.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Lower net revenue levels from insurance
activities due to an increase in claims in comparison to the prior period
contributed to a decrease in other operating income of EUR 24 million, or 19%,
to EUR 102 million.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Non-GAAP operating expenses decreased by
EUR 64 million to EUR 1,747 million in 2009</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, reflecting a </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">decrease in bonuses</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> costs and other cost control
measures</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. IFRS operating
expenses increased by EUR 155</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, or 9%, to EUR 1,966 million due to the
inclusion of consolidated private equity investments from the start of 2009
</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>

          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font></div>
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align="left">&#160;</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">following an agreement reached between
shareholders on the transfer of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">part of the</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> private equity portfolio from Central
Items to the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired
businesses.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Loan impairment provisions have
increased significantly by EUR 361 million, or 154%, to EUR 596 million. The
higher loan impairment levels reflect higher specific loan provisioning levels
and the need for management to reassess and raise the level of incurred but not
identified allowances in response to the economic conditions and consequent
expectations regarding loan losses.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Total assets increased predominantly as
a result </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">purchases of high quality debt
securities for asset and liability management purposes and higher settlement
balances as at 30 June 2009. An increase in total liabilities is mainly
attributable to increases in savings and current account balances for both the
consumer and commercial customers. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">This has also supported the increase of
the Assets under Management </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">in Private Clients</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, which have furthermore benefited from
the improvement in market conditions and a net inflow.&#160;&#160;Overall levels
of Assets under Management continue to be impacted by the weakness in the
financial markets.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">

              <td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">30 June</font></font></div>

              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="10%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">&#160;</font></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="74%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid">
                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Risk-weighted
      assets</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="10%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">53.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">2</font></font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="10%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">80.4</font></font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The RBS acquired businesses cannot be
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">fully </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">evaluated on a stand-alone basis, due to
ongoing business transfers to, coupled with new business originated within, RBS.
Reference should be made to the Interim </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Results for the half year ended 30 June
2009 of the RBS Group.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The RBS acquired businesses</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> performance in the first half of 2009
decreased by EUR 19 million to a loss from continuing operations of EUR 2,763
million predominantly as a result of substantially higher levels of loan
impairments for the same period despite improvements in total income and
operating expenses.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Total income improved from a loss of EUR
811 million to a loss of EUR 150 million predominantly as a result of positive
trading revenue in comparison to the prior period.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Net interest income decreased by EUR 618
million, or 44%, to EUR 783 million reflecting a continued reduction in the
balance sheet, the inclusion </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">funding and liquidity portfolios for the
full period and a general reduction in interest rates.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Net fee and commission income decreased
by EUR 60 million, or 10%, to EUR 526 million mainly as a result of lower
brokerage fees due to reduced market activity</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The improvement </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">in trading income </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">is due to lower losses on counterparty
credit valuation adjustments (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">CVAs</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;) against monolines and</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> lower write downs of collateralised
debt obligations (</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8216;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">CDOs</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#8217;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">) in comparison to the prior period. The
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">losses in 2008 and in early
2009 relating to CDOs and monolines are not</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> expected to reoccur due to the legal
and risk transfer of most underlying instruments to RBS in the course of the
first half year.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Trading income </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">also </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">benefited from favourable results in the
equities business in the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">United Kingdom</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, swap trading in </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Australia</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, and currency gains partially offset by
falling prices on mortgage back securities held in a liquidity
portfolio.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Results from financial transactions
decreased by EUR 844 million to a loss of EUR 1,543 million. This is mainly
attributable to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">fair value
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">losses on a portfolio of
credit default swaps used to hedge the loan book following tightening of credit
spreads</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">and EUR 240 million of losses on the
sale of notes issued by regulatory relief programs and the conduit Orchid to
RBS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">. </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">In addition, the first half of 2008
included significant gains arising from changes in own
credit.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Share of results in equity accounted
investments decreased by EUR 49 million to a loss of EUR 35 million due to the
impairment of an infrastructure investment recognised in the first half of 2009.
Other operating income decreased by EUR 74 million to a </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">loss </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">of EUR 27 million reflecting lower
business disposal gains.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div id="PGBRK" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt">
        <div id="FTR">
          <div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
          </div>
        </div>
        <div id="PN" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">Page 10 of

          <div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
            <hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">

          </div>
          <div>&#160;</div>
          <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
            <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">
              <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: center" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;UNAUDITED</font></font><br></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Operating expenses decreased by EUR 337
million, or 13%, mainly as a result of lower personne</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">l costs</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> Operating expenses for the first half
of 2009 were also affected by the impairment of goodwill on Asian disposal units
classified as held for sale of EUR 194 million.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Loan impairment provisions have
significantly increased by EUR 871 million to EUR 1,113 million reflecting the
challenging credit environment.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Total assets and total liabilities of
the RBS acquired businesses have reduced </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">significantly </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">mainly due to the continued transfer of
businesses and activity to RBS. Trading assets and liabilities reduced by EUR
112 billion due to novations, netting of derivatives and tightening of credit
spreads. Reverse repurchase agreements reduced by EUR 25 billion and repurchase
agreements reduced by EUR 20 billion due to the roll off of transactions to RBS
and no further business being generated in ABN AMRO. Loans have reduced by EUR
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">22</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> billion due to maturing
loans</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">transfers to RBS</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and the reclassification of EUR 4
billion of loans to held for sale as a result of agreed sales of a number of
Asian businesses.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Deferred tax assets have increased
significantly mainly due to significant trading losses,</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> fair value</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> losses on available</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">-</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">for</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">-</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">sale financial investments </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">recognised in other comprehensive income
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">and appreciation of
deferred tax assets in foreign currency against the Euro.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">For further
information regarding the results of the RBS acquired businesses please refer to
the RBS Interim Results for the half year ended 30 June 2009 published on 7
August 2009.</font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25">&#160;</div>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Consolidation effect</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 70%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: super; COLOR: #000000">1</font></font></div>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">2008</font></font></div>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Risk-weighted
      assets</font></font></div>
              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="10%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">2.7</font></font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="10%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">3.9</font></font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" bgcolor="#ccffcc" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
            </tr>
        </table>
      </div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">1 This is the impact per line item of
the private equity investments which are required to be consolidated under
IFRS</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">The Central Items business segment
includes items (referred to as Shared Assets) that are not allocated to, but
economically shared by the Consortium </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">M</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">embers and </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">accumulated amounts </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">accruing </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">to </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Banco </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Santander </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">S.A.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">arising from the disposal of
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Banco Real</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> and other sales and
settlements.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">On 1 April 2008, certain funding and
liquidity portfolios were allocated to either the </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Dutch</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">State</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> acquired businesses or the RBS acquired
businesses and therefore the 2009 results of these </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">portfolios</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> are now reflected in the respective
business segment leading to results not being comparable between the financial
periods due to the prospective nature of the allocation.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Net interest income improved by EUR 469
million to EUR 94 million. The 2008 figure include</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">s</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> the negative </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">results</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> relating to the Group funding and
liquidity portfolios which were transferred out of Central Items and allocated
to the other two business segments on 1 April 2008. Net trading income
</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">was limited due to the
transfer out of most portfolios to the other segments.</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Non-GAAP r</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">esults from financial transactions
decreased by EUR </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">115</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">&#160;</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">to a negative result of EUR
21</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">4</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000"> million</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">, </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">predominantly as a result of losses
recorded on the sale and revaluation of </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">p</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">rivate </font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">e</font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">quity investments. Other operating
income increased by EUR 62 million to EUR 80 million predominantly as a result
of gains on the sale of a stake in an infrastructure capital fund to Fortis Bank
S.A. and a corporate finance business activity to RBS.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25"><br></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">Operating expenses decreased by EUR
1,166 million to EUR 113 million (Non-GAAP operating expenses decreased by EUR
201 million, to EUR 100 million). Operating expenses for the first half of 2008
were predominantly related to expenses from consolidated private equity holdings
which were transferred or sold in 2009.&#160;&#160;The remaining decrease in
operating results is due to lower personnel expenses as business activities are
</font></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; COLOR: #000000; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; COLOR: #000000">progressively reduced in line with the
transition and separation plans.</font></font></div>
      <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

                <div style="DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">Syndication

              </td>
              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>

              <td align="right" valign="bottom" width="8%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">-</font></td>
              <td align="left" nowrap valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 2px solid"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-FAMILY: arial">&#160;</font></td>
